entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 11:58 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -20.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -25.4°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 27.
